# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_EXTRA

## Summary
Sets a vehcile extra

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **INT** extra
* **BOOL** turnOff

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Available extraIds are 1-14, however none of the vehicles have extras above 12.
